description: Ready in under 30 minutes, this pumpkin massaman curry recipe boasts familiar Thai flavours. It's also budget-friendly, making it an ideal family dinner.
name: Pumpkin massaman curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, cook rice according to packet instructions. Top curry with peanuts and coriander, then serve with rice and lime wedges.
